description: TommyD has invited DJ over to the house where he's been staying.  DJ thought the visit sounded perfectly innocent over the phone.  'We'll just hang out,' Tommy told him. Then he breaks out a beastly, pink dildo for DJ's asshole, just big enough to prepare him for Tommy's throbbing cock.Enjoy!
title: Whip It Good
